cit:deliveryPoint.gco:CharacterString: Bedford Institute of Oceanography, Fisheries and Oceans Canada
Bedford Institute of Oceanography, Fisheries and Oceans Canada

cit:title.gco:CharacterString: Canadian Integrated Ocean Observing System Metadata Profile of ISO 19115
Maritimes Region Historical Coastal Rosette Vertical Profiles

lan:textGroup.lan:LocalisedCharacterString: Profils verticaux des rosettes historiques de l'Arctique de la région des

mri:abstract.gco:CharacterString: Historical coastal missions in which DFO Bedford Institute of Oceanography participated in between 1969 and present which collected rosette vertical profile data. These missions were part of various projects in several coastal areas around Nova Scotia and Southern New Brunswick.

lan:textGroup.lan:LocalisedCharacterString: Missions côtières historiques auxquelles l'Institut océanographique de Bedford du MPO a participé entre 1969 et aujourd'hui et qui ont permis de recueillir des données de profil vertical par rosette. Ces missions s'inscrivaient dans le cadre de divers projets dans plusieurs zones côtières de la Nouvelle-Écosse et du sud du Nouveau-Brunswick.

mcc:description.gco:CharacterString: EPSG::5831 - Instantaneous Water Level depth - Depth relative to instantaneous water level uncorrected for tide. Not specific to any location or epoch.

cit:title.gco:CharacterString: Government of Canada Core Subject Thesaurus

mco:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: Availability of data varies both between and within years due to mission cancellations.

lan:textGroup.lan:LocalisedCharacterString: La disponibilité des données varie entre les années et au cours des années en raison des annulations de missions.

cit:name.gco:CharacterString: ERDDAP Maritimes region historical coastal profile data
